title: Large en-suite bedroom
posting_body: ['One month stay only - Huge Discount', 'Available – 1st August to 31st August 2022', 'Gorgeous shared but separate wing main en suite furnished Large Bedroom', 'Best location and Good Deal', 'Call 9783906010 to view and move in..', '$1000  (inclusive of all utilities) for charming furnished main bedroom (en-suite with', 'walk in closet and separate bathroom/shower) .. bedroom is part of a shared 3-bedroom Apt', 'Price covers all utilities - cable / WiFi and electricity', 'Apartment currently has family of two adults using the two other bedrooms', 'Bedroom can be unfurnished at request ..', 'CONDO APT COMES WITH EXTRAS', 'Shared dining and kitchen with most of the essentials already in place including, sofas,', 'tables, dishwasher.. and village complex has pond, gym, 2 pools tennis and basketball', 'courts, small soccer field for kids..', 'This Apt community is centrally located in Burlington and very commuter-friendly between']
